subsection.name: 1. Overview
subsection.p: FnTuple is a function hub class containing some methods to work with tuples in op4j (pairs, triplets, ...). Basically, it allows the creation of tuples from n input functions where n may be two, three, ... depending on whether you are creating a pair, triplet, ... The objects contained in the tuple will be the ones returned by the execution of those functions.
Tuple objects created belong to the JavaTuples opensource project. See JavaTuples for further information on them.
